features: CLINICALLY PROVEN: Nice ‘N CLEAN Fragrance Free Skin Care Baby Wipes are clinically proven as safe on eczema prone skin, earning them the National Eczema Association’s Seal of Acceptance. Trust these pH-balanced hypoallergenic wipes for gentle one-step cleansing and moisturizing!

STRONG & GENTLE: These wet wipes can handle the biggest messes your little one might make and made with 99% naturally derived ingredients and are free from parabens, phthalates, alcohol, chlorine, and dyes.
ENVIRONMENTALLY CONSCIOUS: Unlike other baby wipes, Nice ‘N CLEAN Baby Wipes are 100% plastic free and made from renewable plant based fibers from trees in environmentally managed forests.
WIPES WILL STAY MOIST: The convenient moisture-lock lid keeps the wipes from drying out! There are 2-packs of wipes. Each pack includes 100 wipes for a total of 200 baby wipes.
PROUDLY MADE IN THE USA: Nice ’N CLEAN Wipes are proudly manufactured in the USA with domestic and imported materials.
body.description: Nice ‘N CLEAN Fragrance Free Skin Care Baby Wipes are clinically proven as safe on eczema prone skin, earning them the National Eczema Association’s Seal of Acceptance. Trust these pH-balanced hypoallergenic wipes for gentle one-step cleansing and moisturizing! Our wet wipes can handle big messes your little one may make. Our wipes are 100% plastic-free and made from plant-based fibers. They are also free of parabens, phthalates, alcohol, chlorine, and dyes. All our wipes are proudly made in the USA!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 16, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Ignore the bad reviews and Try these.
reviews.reviewText: I always read all the bad reviews 1st then decide if I can live with it or be ok tossing it. I found these to be as soft and of the same quality as huggies. They dont fall apart nor does your finger poke through them. Im very sensitive to smells and these are virtually scent free. They have a tiny scent if you bury your nose in them. They have enough moisture to clean but are not sloppy wet and are large enough that I dont need 2 each time I use the rest room. I shop Wmart to get the best price on generic items and these are less per pkg and softer than their large house brand wipes. I'm sold on these and will continue to buy as long as everything stays the same. I'm sure it was a fluke if someone got something so bad they had to give these 1 star. Dont be afraid to buy these.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 16, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Be sure to buy these! 5☆
reviews.reviewText: These are very good wipes! I highly recommend them. The size is perfect & being unscented is better for skin.I spent lots of time reading reviews & then comparing price, quantity, size (6.7" x 8"), thickness, moisture, type of packaging, & how they exit the package when used. (Some reviewers expected the wipes to "pop up" like a dry tissue when pulled. That, in my view, is not reasonable for a wet wipe.)Read & compare the product descriptions regarding additives & fibers used. The Nice & Clean wipes are ideal.These have the "lift type" plastic opening that snaps closed to avoid drying out.These would not be suitable for a countertop box as they have their own closure & are not packaged as the "refill peal off sticker" type.There are 56 to a package, just right for take along. (Or pull out several to a zip lock type bag.) Great for the car or shopping.The size is excellent as they can easily be torn in half for makeup or counter wiping. The size is ideal for personal use or for little folks bottoms.Hope these observations may be helpful in your decision to buy! I will continue to reorder Nice & Clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I am not a baby. But these wipes work for me because I have very sensitive skin. They are soft enough to use any where.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good price good wipe
reviews.reviewText: Very affordable well-made wipe will definitely buy again

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice, unscented work really well.
reviews.reviewText: These work good all around. Will be buying again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The best wipes
reviews.reviewText: Must buy. Perfect balance of moistness on the wipe texture. The wipes are not dry like some other wipes which makes these stand out. You can’t go wrong with these.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 4, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality Wipes!
reviews.reviewText: I wish I knew about these back in the 80's when my kids were still in diapers. They are strong, they don't fall apart in your fingers, and they large enough, and moist enough, to do the job with just one or two wipes.What do i use them for? They are great for dogs too! Our bulldog sometimes needs to be cleaned up a little after "doing his big business", and one wipe takes care of things. I hope the company offers these wipes forever!
